Hey All!

Happy New Year!

I am looking to swap my T201 F649 Cobb for a T201 F30 Cobb.

picture of my trader is below.  it is entombed in an SGC 10 holder.  it sure does present nice, reason for the 10 is small tear on the front to the right of his left knee.

PM or email if there is any interest in a swap. 

thanks!

Cliff
